page.title: 06Employment in Caerau
page.content: My father is a toolsetter he works in the{Silent Channel.}In work he is involved with heavy machines. He gets paid weekly on a Thursday. He mostly gets paid{Â£70 or Â£80}which is a good wage because many people are {unemployed.}The amount of work and jobs in Caerau is not as high as in other areas. Many people work in Maesteg, but some people even go further to work, such as{Bridgend}and {Port Talbot.}My fathers work is in Garth on the outskirts of Maesteg. Men and women work there. There are many other jobs and it depends on the amount of effort put into it the job for the payment. There is very little work in Caerau and many of the people in the Llynfi valley are unemployed.
